FastRPC

FastRPC is a XML-RPC based protocol that uses binary data serialization format. Includes C++ and Python implementations and a console client.

Features

Binary data format

Based on XML-RPC. Uses HTTP as transport protocol.

C++ and Python libraries

Libraries support both FastRPC and XML-RPC. Data format negotiated via the HTTP content negotiation.

Fast-RPC Netcat

Command-line utility for development, debugging and administration purposes.
